## Loading Nowcasters

Loading necessary packages:

```{r libraries}
library(devtools)
library(roxygen2)
```

Loading the nowcaster R package:

```{r load-all}
load_all()
```

Loading the data from Belo Horizonte city:

```{r data-bh}
data<-sragBH
```
